bibl.title: spãtion / spãyion - A Wineskin. <spation, spathion>
bibl.note: There is sound evidence to support the meaning of spãtion / spãyion in the Egyptian documents as a "wineskin" or as a "skin (of wine, oil, or fish sauce)". It is possible that spãtion / spãyion was introduced into Egypt by the merchants who frequented the Palestinian wine producing centers of Gaza and Ascalon. <spation, spathion>
